'''Rían''' is an [[Elves|Elf]] of [[Lindon]]. Rían was invented for ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]]'' by [[Amazon Studios]] and he is portrayed by [[Kip Chapman]].<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=https://www.imdb.com/title/tt9788618/fullcredits|articlename=Full Cast & Crew|dated=|website=IMDb|accessed=28 July 2022}}</ref>

== History ==
Throughout the [[Second Age]], Rían accompanied [[Galadriel]] in her hunt for [[Sauron]].

The latest mission was one in which they had to find a certain [[Dúrnost|fortress]] in the [[Northern Waste|Forodwaith]]. Upon finding and beginning to investigate there, it was Rían who first noticed the stalking [[Snow-troll|Hristorco]], shouting a warning to rest of the company.

After the Hristorco was killed, Rían joined in with [[Thondir]] and the rest of the company in demanding that Galadriel returns to [[Lindon]].

Upon his return to Lindon, Rían, like the rest of the company, was honoured in a great ceremony by the High-king [[Gil-Galad]]. As such, he was granted permission to return to [[Valinor]].
